verbs.description: hate groups [V: are] using online games to recruit teens report some extremist groups are using multiplayer games and in - game chat functions as a way to recruit new members npr reports it happening not only in - game but via platforms like discord and reddit as well some recruitment occurs during game livestreams on twitch and youtube and even some harassment campaign planning occurs via these platforms unicorn riot published chat logs from discord last year which revealed plans for the reddit russia harassment frankfurt kurnit spain npr joan donovan kingdom of spain napoleonic data and society youtube greg boyd france charlottesville microsoft
